metadata.title: USN-6449-1 -- FFmpeg vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that FFmpeg incorrectly managed memory resulting  in a memory leak. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service via application crash. This issue only  affected Ubuntu 18.04 LTS and Ubuntu 20.04 LTS. (CVE-2020-22038)  It was discovered that FFmpeg incorrectly handled certain input files,  leading to an integer overflow. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service via application crash. This issue only  affected Ubuntu 20.04 LTS. (CVE-2020-20898, CVE-2021-38090,  CVE-2021-38091, CVE-2021-38092, CVE-2021-38093, CVE-2021-38094)  It was discovered that FFmpeg incorrectly managed memory, resulting in a memory leak.  If a user or automated system were tricked into  processing a specially crafted input file, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service, or execute  arbitrary code. (CVE-2022-48434)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6449-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libavresample-dev - 7:3.4.11-0ubuntu0.1+esm3 libavcodec-extra - 7:3.4.11-0ubuntu0.1+esm3 libavfilter-extra6 - 7:3.4.11-0ubuntu0.1+esm3 libavresample3 - 7:3.4.11-0ubuntu0.1+esm3 libavcodec-dev - 7:3.4.11-0ubuntu0.1+esm3 libavutil-dev - 7:3.4.11-0ubuntu0.1+esm3 libavfilter-extra - 7:3.4.11-0ubuntu0.1+esm3 libswscale-dev - 7:3.4.11-0ubuntu0.1+esm3 libswresample-dev - 7:3.4.11-0ubuntu0.1+esm3 libswresample2 - 7:3.4.11-0ubuntu0.1+esm3 libavdevice-dev - 7:3.4.11-0ubuntu0.1+esm3 libswscale4 - 7:3.4.11-0ubuntu0.1+esm3 libavfilter-dev - 7:3.4.11-0ubuntu0.1+esm3 libpostproc54 - 7:3.4.11-0ubuntu0.1+esm3 libpostproc-dev - 7:3.4.11-0ubuntu0.1+esm3 libavdevice57 - 7:3.4.11-0ubuntu0.1+esm3 libavformat57 - 7:3.4.11-0ubuntu0.1+esm3 libavformat-dev - 7:3.4.11-0ubuntu0.1+esm3 libavutil55 - 7:3.4.11-0ubuntu0.1+esm3 libavfilter6 - 7:3.4.11-0ubuntu0.1+esm3 libavcodec-extra57 - 7:3.4.11-0ubuntu0.1+esm3 libavcodec57 - 7:3.4.11-0ubuntu0.1+esm3 ffmpeg - 7:3.4.11-0ubuntu0.1+esm3 ffmpeg-doc - 7:3.4.11-0ubuntu0.1+esm3 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
